rows.label: tev072101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about Yun'tonam's time with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Yun'tonam if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Yun'tonam about the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Yun'tonam about the xenoforms
captured by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Yun'tonam about the xenoforms
captured by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Yun'tonam if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Within the Ganglion, the powerful rise to the top.
So we Orphe were treated as the lowest of the low.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0002
rows.name:
We were ordered to develop new weapons one after
another. Any attempt to rest was punished with torture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Under such harsh treatment, my companions were
dying by the day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0004
rows.name:
The only ones who managed to survive were the five
Orpheans you rescued.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0005
rows.name:
I never want to return to that place again.
Please, you must protect us from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Whenever I close my eyes, I can see a vivid image
of our homeland. This has been passed down through
my Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is a city shaded by deep green trees that rustle in a
gentle, unceasing wind. Simply being there seems to fill
one with vitality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0012
rows.name:
How can I compare such a place to this treeless city
of dull concrete houses?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0013
rows.name:
I feel like we've been locked away in some prison.
I need to speak to our botanist, Mon'barac.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps there is some way he can increase the tree
cover and make this city more livable for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0019
rows.name:
When we were being held by the Ganglion,
I met Wrothians on multiple occasions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0020
rows.name:
They were completely different from the Ganglion
soldiers that had been tormenting us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0021
rows.name:
One of our people collapsed from exhaustion while
he was repairing the Vasara—one of their Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0022
rows.name:
But rather than rebuking him, the Wrothian carried the
Orphean who had collapsed someplace out of sight so
that he could rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0023
rows.name:
The kindness they show to those weaker than themselves
is something that they seem to have in common with
you humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0028
rows.name:
We were not the only species of xenoform that had
been taken from their home planet and forced to
accompany the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0029
rows.name:
With Luxaar gone, I worry what his desperate
underlings might do to the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Have you considered traveling to each region to free
the xenoforms being held captive there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0031
rows.name:
I imagine that, like us, they could be a great help in
your efforts to make new lives for yourselves here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0036
rows.name:
The Ganglion have been destroyed, and most of their
captive xenoforms have taken refuge in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0037
rows.name:
I must admit that I still have difficulty understanding
the way beings who are devoid of Ovah think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Yet as residents of this city, we hope to learn to
better understand our alien brethren.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG0039
rows.name:
Hopefully we can live together in a symbiotic fashion,
forming an alliance quite different from the way the
Ganglion operated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1001
rows.name:
When we were being held by the Ganglion,
I met Wrothians on multiple occasions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1002
rows.name:
They were completely different from the Ganglion
soldiers that had been tormenting us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1003
rows.name:
One of our people collapsed from exhaustion while
he was repairing the Vasara—one of their Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1004
rows.name:
But rather than rebuking him, the Wrothian carried the
Orphean who had collapsed someplace out of sight so
that he could rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1005
rows.name:
Perhaps these Prone could stand to learn something
from the kindness of the Wrothian people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1010
rows.name: I wonder how much longer I must stay like this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1011
rows.name:
To be so savagely punished just for eating a tree!
These Prone are truly terrifying creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1012
rows.name:
I can only hope that our botanist, Mon'barac, will
soon be able to transform New LA into a place where
we can freely eat whatever trees we like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1016
rows.name:
The Ganglion have been destroyed, and most of their
captive xenoforms have taken refuge in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1017
rows.name:
Now we all must combine our talents in order to find
a way to survive on this cruel world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1018
rows.name: I hope these Prone are able to understand that as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072101_MSG1019
rows.name:
We have such difficulty understanding each other.
It's as if we simply do not mesh at all.[ST:wait ]
